title: DDFP 603: Week 4 recap, Bills' chances of winning the AFC East & SB LII picks
itunes:title: DDFP 603: Week 4 recap, Bills' chances of winning the AFC East & SB LII picks
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Maurice Jones-Drew to recap the biggest storylines from Week 4 of NFL action, highlighting the Panthers’ victory over the Patriots (9:18) and the Rams’ victory over the Cowboys (7:35). Then, the fellas conduct the annual DDFP Quarter Pole Awards (17:00), honoring the quarter season MVP, Rookie of the Year and the Most Disappointing Team so far. Plus, Colleen Wolfe joins the show for another edition of the Q&A (35:30), where the group takes questions from Justin Forsett, Marcedes Lewis and some loyal members of the Shek Republic.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
